member.name: M:log4net.RabbitMQ.RabbitMQAppender.SetProtocol(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the protocol from a string. Uses internally.

member.name: P:log4net.RabbitMQ.RabbitMQAppender.Topic
member.summary: Gets or sets the routing key (aka. topic) with which to send messages. Defaults to {0}, which in the end is 'error' for log.Error("..."), and so on. An example could be setting this property to 'ApplicationType.MyApp.Web.{0}'

member.name: P:log4net.RabbitMQ.RabbitMQAppender.HostName
member.summary: Gets or sets the host name of the broker to log to.

member.name: P:log4net.RabbitMQ.RabbitMQAppender.Exchange
member.summary: Gets or sets the exchange to bind the logger output to.
